createdAt: Niagara Falls is included in the list of natural attractions in Canada. In addition, it is considered one of the wonders of the world. The waterfall is located on the border of Canada and America. With a terrifying roar, tons of water streams powerfully fall every second. The waterfall is located in a dense cloud of spray, since the water pressure here is quite strong.
name: Niagara Falls

createdAt: The architectural complex, where working meetings of the Canadian government are held, looks like a medieval castle from the outside. It is located in a convenient location for travelers - in the heart of Ottawa. The gray stone from which the building is built seems gloomy at first glance.
name: Parliament Building of Canada (Ottawa)

createdAt: Among the must-see attractions in Canada is St. Joseph's Oratory. The beginning of construction work dates back to 1904. The project initiative belongs to Andre Bessette. The original version of the oratorio was a small chapel, which was nestled on the slope of Mont-Royal next to Notre Dame College.
name: Oratory of St. Joseph (Montreal)

createdAt: The neo-Gothic style gave the basilica a strict, almost ascetic appearance. The building was erected in the 19th century. It is truly luxurious. Tourists listen with surprise and admiration to the stories that the sculptures here are gilded, and the interior is decorated with fleur-de-lis gold leaf.
name: Basilica of Notre-Dame de Montreal (Montreal)

createdAt: The collections of the Royal Ontario Museum contain more than 6,000,000 objects. It has more than 40 galleries. In the exhibitions you can see artifacts, dinosaur collections, art objects from Africa and the Middle East. The museum often holds exhibitions, so it will be of interest to those who decide what to see in Canada.
name: Royal Ontario Museum (Toronto)

createdAt: This is entertainment of the highest class. An unforgettable experience is guaranteed to everyone who walks through it at least once. Below under the bridge you can see not only the river, but also an endless green forest. Of course, passage across the bridge is completely safe. It is surrounded on both sides by strong railings and metal mesh.
name: Capilano Suspension Bridge (Vancouver)

createdAt: In the province of Alberta there is a natural landmark of Canada - the National Park. Its area exceeds 44,000 square kilometers. This is a protected area of ​​Canadian nature. The territory is protected by the state. In the province of Alberta there is a natural landmark of Canada - the National Park. Its area exceeds 44,000 square kilometers.
name: Wood Buffalo National Park (Alberta)
